A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is easily the best StarWars movie yet. Mark Hamil\, Daisy Ridley\, John boyaega(probably spelled wrong)\, Adam Driver and all the other main actors were really good. You feel for these characters when they are put in danger you dont know if they are gonna die. 
SPOILERS!!!


I liked the fact that snoke died\, it felt like they got rid of him to make the new trilogy feel like something new and not just a recap of the original trilogy. I like the fact that luke did not die since that would just be wasting his character i think hes gonna make a sacrifice in the last movie so that Rey can turn/take down Kylo Ren. 



SPOILERS END!
Overall a great movie that brings something new to the fantastic table that is StarWars
